title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Social Media              Social Media           Be sure to following Thomas Edison NHP on all our social media pages. Stay up to date on all the latest happenings here at the park, including upcoming events and programming!       YouTube Thomas Edison NHP is on YouTube! Check out our page and view our latest videos, including those made by visiting students during the Hollywood NJ education program!      Twitter Thomas Edison National Historical Park is now on Twitter. Follow us at twitter.com - our username is ThomasEdisonNHP, or see our feed at twitter.com/ThomasEdisonNHP to receive updates on breaking news in the park, upcoming events, or even to find out what Edison was doing this day in history.      Facebook Thomas Edison National Historical Park is on Facebook! Follow us and receive updates on all sorts of events happening at the park!      Curators' Curiosity Blog Be sure to check out the Curators' Curiosity blog featuring unique artifacts, documents, and projects from the curators at the park!
